register.checkEmailVerify: Please check your email to verify your account before logging in.

forgotPassword.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
forgotPassword.sentInstructions: We've sent you password reset instructions
forgotPassword.sentLinkTo: We've sent a password reset link to:
forgotPassword.clickLink: Click the link in the email to reset your password. The link will expire in 1 hour.
forgotPassword.checkInbox: Check your inbox for password reset instructions
forgotPassword.somethingWrong: Something went wrong. Please try again.
forgotPassword.securityNote: If an account exists with this email, you'll receive password reset instructions. For security reasons, we don't reveal whether an account exists.

changePassword.subtitle: Update your account password
changePassword.subtitleSet: Please set a new password for your account

changePassword.requirements: Password must contain uppercase, lowercase, and number
changePassword.mustBeDifferent: New password must be different from current password
changePassword.securityReason: For security reasons, you must change your password before continuing.
changePassword.tokenNotFound: Reset token not found. Please request a new password reset link.

verifyEmail.clickLink: Click the verification link in the email we sent you to activate your account.
verifyEmail.checkSpam: Check your spam or junk folder. The email should arrive within a few minutes.

testWebChatbot.widgetNotFoundDesc: The chatbot widget could not be found
testWebChatbot.testInstructions: Click on the chat bubble in the bottom right corner to open the chat and test your bot. This is exactly how it will appear on your website.
testWebChatbot.previewArea: Preview area - The chat widget will appear in the corner
testWebChatbot.sampleContentDesc: This is a preview area that simulates your website. The chat widget will appear in the corner just like it would on your actual site.
testWebChatbot.testStep1: Click the chat bubble to open the chat
testWebChatbot.testStep2: Send a message to test the AI response
testWebChatbot.testStep5: Verify the header logo and colors

connections.chooseWorkspace: Choose a workspace above to configure its connections.
connections.createWorkspaceFirst: Create a workspace first to configure connections and chatbots.
connections.oneConnectionDescription: Each workspace can have one WhatsApp connection and one Web Widget. This keeps your conversations and settings organized per client or project.

whatsappSection.hasConnection: This workspace has a WhatsApp connection configured
whatsappSection.noConnection: Connect your WhatsApp account to start sending messages

ecommerce.connectedDesc: Store connected! Now set up the webhook below for auto-sync.
ecommerce.confirmDisconnect: Are you sure you want to disconnect "{name}"?
ecommerce.syncCompleteDesc: Syncing products and orders. Webhooks will handle future updates automatically.

webhooks.description: Receive real-time notifications when events occur in your account. Integrate WhatsApp with your external systems automatically.

whatsapp.connectFirst: Please connect a WhatsApp session first in the Connections section
whatsapp.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this chatbot configuration?
whatsapp.noConfigSaved: No configuration saved. Please configure the bot first.
whatsapp.aiPausedDesc: The bot will NOT respond until you reactivate it

web.subtitle: Configure AI for your web chat widgets
web.createFirst: Please create a widget first in the Connections section

chatbot.createWorkspaceFirst: Create a workspace first to configure chatbot settings.
chatbot.chooseWorkspace: Choose a workspace above to configure its chatbot settings.
chatbot.connectWhatsAppFirst: Connect a WhatsApp account to this workspace first to configure the chatbot.
chatbot.createWebWidgetFirst: Create a Web Widget for this workspace first to configure the chatbot.
chatbot.workspaceSpecificDescription: Chatbot configuration is unique to each workspace. Changes here only affect the selected workspace's WhatsApp and Web Widget chatbots.
chatbot.instructionsPlaceholder: Tell the AI how to behave...

apiKeys.title: API Keys
apiKeys.subtitle: Configure your AI provider API key
apiKeys.subtitleWorkspace: Configure your AI provider API key for this workspace
apiKeys.notConfigured: Configure your API key to enable AI features for this workspace
apiKeys.apiKeySecure: Your API key is encrypted and stored securely
apiKeys.howToGetKey: How to get your {provider} API Key

modelConfig.title: AI Model Parameters
modelConfig.subtitle: Adjust the behavior and quality of responses
modelConfig.maxTokensDesc: Maximum tokens in the response. Higher = longer responses but more cost.
modelConfig.maxTokensWarning: Not recommended more than 4000 tokens (higher latency and cost)
modelConfig.presencePenaltyDesc: Encourages talking about new topics. 0 = no penalty
modelConfig.intentClassifierDesc: Maximum tokens for intent analysis (internal use).
modelConfig.intentClassifierNote: Only modify if you experience MAX_TOKENS errors in the logs.

conversationConfig.title: Conversation Configuration
conversationConfig.subtitle: Control the flow and behavior of conversations
conversationConfig.contextWindowDesc: Number of previous messages to include in context
conversationConfig.maxConversationLengthDesc: Maximum messages before resetting the conversation
conversationConfig.typingIndicatorDesc: Show "typing..." while waiting to batch messages
conversationConfig.messageBatchingDesc: Groups quick user messages to respond once with all context
conversationConfig.fallbackSystemDesc: Automatic detection of uncertainty and human assistance requests

advancedConfig.title: Advanced Configuration
advancedConfig.subtitle: Advanced and experimental features
advancedConfig.logLevelDesc: Level of information saved in logs
advancedConfig.retentionDaysDesc: Time data is kept before deletion (30-365 days)
advancedConfig.softDeleteDesc: Mark as deleted before permanent removal
advancedConfig.softDeleteInfo: Data is marked as deleted and kept for 30 days before permanent removal. GDPR compliant.

botSection.title: Your Bot
botSection.subtitle: Configure your virtual assistant's personality. These settings define how it presents itself and communicates with your customers.
botSection.botNameHint: The name it will introduce itself with. E.g.: "Hi, I'm Ana, your virtual assistant"
botSection.toneHint: How the bot speaks: like a friend or like a bank employee?
botSection.emojiHint: Do you want it to use üòä in its messages? Depends on your brand.
botSection.lengthHint: Short responses = faster. Detailed = more information.
botSection.autoLanguageDesc: The bot detects what language the customer writes in and responds in that same language. No configuration needed.

businessSection.title: Your Business
businessSection.subtitle: Tell the bot about your company so it can inform customers
businessSection.whyThisDesc: The bot will use this information to answer questions like "What do you sell?", "How can I contact you?" or "Where are you located?".
businessSection.businessNamePlaceholder: E.g.: Maria's Flowers, TechStore, Smile Dental Clinic...
businessSection.businessNameHint: The commercial name of your company or store
businessSection.businessDescPlaceholder: E.g.: We are a family florist with 20 years of experience. We sell fresh flowers, plants and make arrangements for weddings and events.
businessSection.businessDescHint: Explain what your business does in 2-3 sentences. The bot will use this to introduce itself.
businessSection.contactDesc: When a customer asks how to contact you, the bot will give them this information.
businessSection.businessHoursDesc: The bot will inform about your schedule when asked "What time do you open?" or "Are you open?"
businessSection.scheduleHint: Write it as you want the bot to tell customers
businessSection.outOfHoursPlaceholder: E.g.: Thanks for writing to us. We are currently closed but we will respond tomorrow first thing.
businessSection.outOfHoursHint: This message is sent when someone writes outside your hours (if you have that option enabled)
businessSection.socialMediaDesc: If a customer asks "Do you have Instagram?" or "Where can I follow you?", the bot will give them these links.
businessSection.locationsDesc: If you have a physical store, add it here. The bot can say "We are at Main Street 123" or send the Google Maps link.

behaviorSection.title: Bot Behavior
behaviorSection.subtitle: Define what your bot should and should NOT do
behaviorSection.whyThisDesc: Here you define your bot's "mission". Is its job to sell? Resolve doubts? Capture emails? You can also tell it what things it should NEVER do.
behaviorSection.objectivesDesc: This helps the bot prioritize. If you select "Sell", it will try to recommend products. If you select "Capture leads", it will ask for contact details.
behaviorSection.restrictionsDesc: Add things the bot should never do. E.g.: "Don't give competitor prices", "Don't promise delivery times", "Don't talk about politics".
behaviorSection.specialInstructionsDesc: Anything else you want the bot to keep in mind. This is like giving it additional "notes".
behaviorSection.specialInstructionsPlaceholder: E.g.: Always mention we have free shipping from ‚Ç¨50. If they ask about sizes, recommend checking the size guide on the website. When someone asks about an out-of-stock product, offer to add them to the waiting list.

productsSection.title: Products
productsSection.subtitle: Configure your catalog so the bot can recommend products
productsSection.whyThisDesc: If you sell products, the bot can recommend them when a customer asks "I'm looking for something for dry hair" or "what do you recommend as a gift".
productsSection.recommendProducts: Do you want the bot to recommend products?
productsSection.yesProducts: Yes, I sell products or services
productsSection.recommendHint: If you choose "No", the bot will only answer questions but won't recommend products.
productsSection.productSources: Where do we get your products from?
productsSection.productSourcesDesc: You can import products from your online store, upload an Excel/CSV, or add them one by one.
productsSection.categoriesDesc: Organize your products into categories (e.g.: "Shampoos", "Creams", "Makeup"). The bot will ask questions to understand what the customer is looking for before recommending.
productsSection.recommendationFormat: When the bot recommends a product, what information should it include?
productsSection.recommendationFormatDesc: Check what you want to appear in each recommendation.
productsSection.maxProductsHint: If you set 3, the bot will say "I recommend these 3 products..." instead of showing 10 at once.
productsSection.noResults: If the bot doesn't find matching products, what does it do?
productsSection.noResultsDesc: You can select multiple options. The bot will combine them according to the situation.
productsSection.noResultsAskMore: Ask the customer for more information

shippingSection.title: Shipping and Payments
shippingSection.subtitle: Info to answer "How much is shipping?" or "Do you accept PayPal?"
shippingSection.whyThisDesc: When a customer asks about shipping, payments or returns, the bot will use this information to respond.
shippingSection.shippingMethodsDesc: Add the shipping options you offer. E.g.: "Standard shipping - 3-5 days - ‚Ç¨4.95"
shippingSection.name: Name
shippingSection.shippingZonesDesc: Where do you ship to? Type and press Enter. E.g.: "Spain", "Europe", "Worldwide"
shippingSection.paymentMethodsDesc: How can your customers pay? Type and press Enter. E.g.: "Card", "PayPal", "Bank transfer"
shippingSection.returnsDesc: When they ask "Can I return a product?", the bot will give this info.
shippingSection.warrantyDesc: Do you offer warranty on your products? Describe it here.
shippingSection.warrantyPlaceholder: E.g.: 2 year warranty on all products. Satisfaction guarantee: if you don't like it, we'll refund your money.

escalationSection.title: Human Escalation
escalationSection.subtitle: When the bot should hand over the conversation to a person
escalationSection.whyThisDesc: Sometimes the bot can't resolve something and needs to hand over the conversation to a real person. Here you configure when it should do so and what data to ask the customer first.
escalationSection.triggers: The bot should escalate to a human when:
escalationSection.triggersDesc: Check the situations where you want the bot to stop responding and notify your team.
escalationSection.triggerHuman: Customer asks to speak to a person
escalationSection.escalationMessageDesc: This message is sent to the customer when the bot decides to hand over the conversation to a person.
escalationSection.escalationMessagePlaceholder: E.g.: I understand you need more personalized help. I'm transferring you to a colleague who will assist you right away. One moment!
escalationSection.infoToCollect: Before escalating, ask the customer for:
escalationSection.infoToCollectDesc: The bot will ask for this data from the customer before handing over to a human. This way your team already has the info when they receive the conversation.
escalationSection.infoSavedCrm: This info is saved in the customer's profile (CRM)

availabilitySection.title: Bot Availability
availabilitySection.subtitle: When the bot responds automatically
availabilitySection.whenRespond: When do you want the bot to respond?
availabilitySection.alwaysOnDesc: The bot responds at any time, every day. Recommended to maximize customer service.
availabilitySection.outsideHoursDesc: The bot responds when your team is not available. During business hours, messages are handled by your human team.
availabilitySection.duringHoursDesc: The bot only responds during your business hours. Outside hours, an automatic message is sent.
availabilitySection.messageDuringHours: Message during business hours (when bot is paused):
availabilitySection.messageDuringHoursPlaceholder: Thanks for your message. Our team will respond shortly.
availabilitySection.messageOutsideHoursPlaceholder: Thanks for contacting us. Our business hours are {hours}. We'll respond as soon as possible.
availabilitySection.hoursPlaceholderHint: Use {hours} to insert the schedule automatically
availabilitySection.tipDesc: Having the bot active 24/7 improves customer experience and you don't miss sales opportunities outside hours. Only limit hours if you really need your team to handle messages in real time.

additionalSection.title: Additional Information
additionalSection.subtitle: Everything else the bot should know
additionalSection.whyThisDesc: Here you can write anything that doesn't fit in other sections but the bot should know. It's like a "catch-all" for information.
additionalSection.ideas: Ideas of what to put here:
additionalSection.promotionsExample: "Right now we have 20% off with code SUMMER20"
additionalSection.temporaryNoticesExample: "This week we're on vacation, orders ship on Monday"
additionalSection.anythingElseExample: Whatever you think the bot should mention

conversationSection.title: Conversation
conversationSection.subtitle: How the bot greets and answers to frequently asked questions
conversationSection.whyThisDesc: Configure how the conversation starts and add predefined answers to questions you always get.
conversationSection.welcomeMessageDesc: This is the first message the customer will see when they start chatting. Leave empty if you don't want an automatic message.
conversationSection.welcomeMessagePlaceholder: E.g.: Hi! üëã I'm Ana, the virtual assistant at Maria's Flowers. How can I help you today?
conversationSection.faqsDesc: Add questions you always get with their exact answers. The bot will use them when it detects those questions.
conversationSection.faqsExample: E.g.: "Do you ship to the Canary Islands?" ‚Üí "Yes, we ship to the Canary Islands. Shipping takes 5-7 days and costs ‚Ç¨8."
conversationSection.question: Question

visitorDataSection.title: Visitor Data
visitorDataSection.subtitle: Configure what information to ask from web visitors
visitorDataSection.whyThisDesc: The bot can ask for name, email or phone from your website visitors. This information is automatically saved in your customer database.
visitorDataSection.collectDataDesc: The bot will ask for contact information during the conversation
visitorDataSection.name: Name
visitorDataSection.endOfChat: At the end - Before saying goodbye
visitorDataSection.timingHint: "During conversation" is more natural and has better response rate
visitorDataSection.handoffEmailHint: When a visitor asks to speak to a human, you'll receive a notification at this email

branding.title: Agency Branding
branding.subtitle: Customize the appearance of your account and widgets
branding.enterpriseDescription: Custom branding is exclusively available for the Enterprise plan. Customize your logo, colors and remove the 'Powered by Whahook' badge.
branding.upgradeForBranding: Upgrade your plan to use custom branding
branding.upgradeForSmtp: Upgrade your plan to use custom SMTP
branding.upgradeForDomain: Upgrade your plan to use custom domain
branding.upgradeForLogos: Upgrade your plan to upload logos
branding.upgradeForFavicon: Upgrade your plan to upload favicon
branding.faviconHint: The favicon appears in the browser tab. Recommended: 32x32 or 16x16 pixels.
branding.configureDnsNow: Now configure DNS and verify the domain
branding.checkDnsConfig: Make sure you have configured DNS correctly
branding.confirmDeleteDomain: Are you sure you want to delete the custom domain?
branding.testEmailSentTo: A test email has been sent to {email}
branding.smtpConnectionError: Could not connect to SMTP server
branding.tabTitleHint: Text that appears in the browser tab when accessing your custom domain.
branding.primaryColorHint: This color will be applied to buttons, icons and accent elements in the app. Texts maintain neutral colors to ensure readability.
branding.agencyNameHint: Will be shown instead of 'Whahook' in widgets
branding.showPoweredByHint: Shows a small badge at the bottom of the widget
branding.customTextHint: Leave empty to completely hide the badge
branding.customDomainDesc: Use your own domain so your clients can access the panel without seeing 'whahook' in the URL. For example: panel.youragency.com
branding.addCnameRecord: Add this CNAME record in your DNS provider (GoDaddy, Cloudflare, etc.):
branding.dnsPropagation: DNS propagation can take up to 48 hours, although it's usually faster.
branding.enterSubdomain: Enter the full subdomain you want to use (e.g.: panel.youragency.com)
branding.smtpDesc: Configure your own SMTP server so notification emails are sent from your domain. This includes invitations, WhatsApp connection/disconnection alerts, etc.
branding.leaveEmptyPassword: Leave empty to keep current password
branding.replyToHint: Email that users will reply to when they respond to your notifications
branding.emailsFromWhahook: Emails will be sent from Whahook's server
branding.brandingAppliesAll: This branding applies to all your workspaces by default
branding.brandingCustomizeEach: You can customize the branding of each workspace individually
branding.brandingFallback: If a workspace doesn't have its own branding, it will use this agency branding

invitations.title: My Team
invitations.subtitle: Invite team members to help you manage messages or marketing

invitations.clientsOnly: Only clients can invite members to their team.
invitations.invitationSentDesc: An invitation has been sent to {email}
invitations.confirmRemove: Are you sure you want to remove this team member?

agent.fullDescription: Can view dashboard, manage messages, clients and campaigns.

members.emailHint: This email will also receive workspace notifications (WhatsApp connection/disconnection, etc.)

roles.clientDesc: Client - Dashboard, Messages, Clients, Campaigns + Connections

members.inviteFirst: Invite your first member to get started
members.aboutAccessLinksDescription: Each member receives a unique link to access this workspace. Guests can view and manage their data without needing a Whahook account. You can regenerate links at any time to revoke access.
members.confirmRemove: Are you sure you want to remove this member?

workspaces.title: Workspaces
workspaces.subtitle: Manage your workspaces, connections, and client access
workspaces.namePlaceholder: e.g., My Business, Client Name, Restaurant ABC...
workspaces.nameHint: This name will be visible to you and your team
workspaces.descriptionPlaceholder: Brief description of this workspace, client details, notes...
workspaces.noWorkspacesDescription: Create your first workspace to start connecting WhatsApp, configuring chatbots, and managing your clients.
workspaces.membersDescription: Manage members and send invitations for this workspace
workspaces.aboutDescription: Each workspace represents a separate business or client. It includes its own WhatsApp connection, Web Widget, chatbot configuration, and client database. Use workspaces to keep everything organized and isolated per project.
workspaces.tipDescription: Click the expand button on any workspace to access advanced features like client access links, remote QR connection, and more.
workspaces.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this workspace? All associated data will be lost.

billing.title: Billing
billing.subtitle: Manage your plan and payment method
billing.planNotAvailable: Plan not available at this time

profile.title: My Profile
profile.subtitle: Manage your personal information and preferences
profile.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters

workspaceWhiteLabel.title: Workspace Branding
workspaceWhiteLabel.subtitle: Customize branding for this client
workspaceWhiteLabel.subtitleEnterprise: Customize branding for this specific client
workspaceWhiteLabel.enterpriseRequired: Custom branding is available on the Enterprise plan. Upgrade your plan to customize branding for each workspace.
workspaceWhiteLabel.optionalDescription: If you don't configure branding for this workspace, your agency branding from Settings > Branding will be used.
workspaceWhiteLabel.useCustomBrandingDesc: Show client's brand instead of your agency brand
workspaceWhiteLabel.clientNameDesc: Will be shown in widget and panels

campaigns.title: Campaigns
campaigns.subtitle: Send bulk messages to your clients
campaigns.confirmSend: Are you sure you want to send this campaign now?
campaigns.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this campaign?

empty.title: No campaigns
empty.subtitle: Create your first campaign to send bulk messages to your clients

errors.completeFields: Please complete the campaign name and message
errors.noRecipients: No recipients match the selected filters

modal.title: New Campaign
modal.emailSubjectPlaceholder: E.g.: Special offer just for you!
modal.whatsappPlaceholder: Hello {{name}}, we have a special offer for you...
modal.leaveEmptyDraft: Leave empty to save as draft

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your business needs

pricingPage.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricingPage.subtitle: Choose the perfect plan for your business. Start with a 7-day free trial.

changePlans.a: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes will be reflected in your next billing cycle.

aiCosts.a: AI costs are not included in the plans. You use your own Google Gemini API key and pay directly to Google. This gives you full control over your AI spending.

freeTrial.a: Yes! All plans come with a 7-day free trial with full Starter plan features. No credit card required.

workspaces.a: Workspaces are isolated environments for different businesses or clients. Perfect for agencies managing multiple clients - each workspace has its own WhatsApp connections, clients, and conversations.

whiteLabel.a: With Enterprise plan, you can hide the Whahook brand from your clients. The widget footer and client panel will show your agency's brand instead.

cancel.a: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. No questions asked.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Customer Service?
cta.subtitle: Join hundreds of businesses already automating their WhatsApp conversations
cta.benefits: ‚úì No commitment  ‚úì Cancel anytime  ‚úì No credit card required

featuresPage.title: Powerful Features for Modern Businesses
featuresPage.subtitle: Everything you need to automate and scale your WhatsApp customer service

aiChatbot.title: AI-Powered Chatbot
aiChatbot.desc: Advanced AI that understands context and provides natural, human-like responses to your customers 24/7.

multiAccount.title: Multi-Account Management
multiAccount.desc: Manage multiple WhatsApp accounts from a single dashboard. Perfect for teams and agencies.

scheduling.title: Smart Scheduling
scheduling.desc: Automated appointment booking and calendar management integrated with your existing systems.

crm.title: CRM Integration
crm.desc: Built-in CRM to manage contacts, track conversations, and maintain customer relationships.

analytics.title: Advanced Analytics
analytics.desc: Detailed insights into conversation metrics, response times, and customer satisfaction.

instant.title: Instant Responses
instant.desc: Automated quick replies and message templates for common questions and scenarios.

security.title: Enterprise Security
security.desc: Bank-level encryption, data privacy compliance, and secure message handling.

multiLang.title: Multi-Language Support
multiLang.desc: AI that understands and responds in multiple languages automatically.

availability.title: 24/7 Availability
availability.desc: Never miss a customer message with round-the-clock automated responses.

conversation.title: Intelligent Conversation Management
conversation.desc: Our AI doesn't just respond‚Äîit understands context, remembers previous conversations, and provides personalized experiences for each customer.

integrations.title: Seamless Integrations
integrations.desc: Connect WhaHook with your existing tools and workflows. We integrate with popular CRMs, calendars, and business applications.

team.title: Team Collaboration
team.desc: Built for teams with features that help your staff work together efficiently and provide better customer service.

aboutPage.title: About WhaHook
aboutPage.subtitle: We're on a mission to revolutionize business communication through AI-powered WhatsApp automation.

story.title: Our Story
story.p1: Founded in 2024, WhaHook was born from a simple observation: businesses were struggling to keep up with the growing volume of WhatsApp messages from customers. Response times were slow, customer satisfaction was declining, and teams were overwhelmed.
story.p2: We knew there had to be a better way. By combining the power of AI with the ubiquity of WhatsApp, we created a platform that helps businesses automate conversations while maintaining a personal touch.
story.p3: Today, WhaHook serves hundreds of businesses worldwide, processing millions of messages and helping companies provide better customer service 24/7.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How quickly will I receive a response?
faq.a1: We typically respond to all inquiries within 24 hours during business days. For urgent matters, please use our live chat feature.
faq.a2: Yes, phone support is available for Professional and Enterprise plan customers during business hours.
faq.a3: Absolutely! Contact us to schedule a personalized demo of WhaHook's features with our team.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using WhaHook, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

license.title: 2. Use License
license.content: Permission is granted to temporarily use WhaHook for personal or commercial purposes. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title, and under this license you may not:
items: Use the materials for any commercial purpose without authorization
Attempt to decompile or reverse engineer any software
Remove any copyright or proprietary notations
Transfer the materials to another person

accounts.title: 3. User Accounts
accounts.content1: When you create an account with us, you must provide accurate, complete, and current information. Failure to do so constitutes a breach of the Terms, which may result in immediate termination of your account.
accounts.content2: You are responsible for safeguarding the password and for all activities that occur under your account.

acceptableUse.title: 4. Acceptable Use
acceptableUse.content: You agree not to use WhaHook to:

payment.title: 5. Payment and Billing
payment.content1: Paid services are billed in advance on a monthly or annual basis. All fees are non-refundable except as required by law.
payment.content2: We reserve the right to change our pricing at any time. Price changes will be communicated 30 days in advance.

availability.title: 6. Service Availability
availability.content: We strive to provide 99.9% uptime but do not guarantee uninterrupted access to the service. We may suspend service for maintenance or updates with reasonable notice.

ip.title: 7. Intellectual Property
ip.content: The service and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by WhaHook and are protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

termination.title: 8. Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account immediately, without prior notice, for any breach of these Terms. Upon termination, your right to use the service will immediately cease.

liability.title: 9. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: In no event shall WhaHook be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses.

changes.title: 10. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify or replace these Terms at any time. We will provide notice of any material changes by posting the new Terms on this page with an updated effective date.

contact.title: 11. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us:

collect.title: 1. Information We Collect
collect.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, including:

use.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
use.content: We use the information we collect to:
items: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
Send you technical notices and support messages
Respond to your comments and questions

security.title: 3. Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data:
items: Encryption in transit and at rest (AES-256)

retention.title: 4. Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide you services. You can request deletion of your data at any time.

cookies.title: 6. Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our service and hold certain information. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent.

thirdParty.title: 7. Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: We use third-party services that may collect information:

contact.title: 8. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

what.title: What Are Cookies
what.content: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device when you visit our website. They help us provide you with a better experience by remembering your preferences and understanding how you use our service.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.desc: Required for the website to function properly. Cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.desc: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website.

managing.title: Managing Cookies
managing.content: You can control and manage cookies through your browser settings. Please note that removing or blocking cookies may impact your user experience.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about our Cookie Policy, contact us at: privacy@whahook.com
